name: italy
description: You arrive at the airport in Italy. You take a second to admire your surroundings. Your phone rings/ your guide turns to you.

name: ecuador
description: You arrive at the airport in Ecuador. You smell fresh {Ecuadorian Food} coming from a nearby restaurant. Your phone rings/ your guide turns to you.

name: australia
description: You arrive at the airport in Australia. You take a second to admire your surroundings. Your phone rings/ your guide turns to you.

name: zambia
description: You arrive at the Harry Mwanga Nkumbula airport in Zambia. You look around, taking in the scenery and people. Your phone rings/ your guide turns to you.

name: hawaii
description: Aloha, you have arrived at one of the beautiful islands in the Pacific. You are on the island of Oahu. Please enjoy the beautiful beaches all around the island. Mahalo!!!

name: nepal
description: Namaste, Welcome to the land of Gurkha. You are in one of the beautiful countries of South Asia. It contains eight of the ten world’s tallest mountains. The world tallest mountain Mt. Everest is also located in Nepal. Enjoy the culture here natural beauty and food.

name: antarctica
description: Welcome to the land of Aliens and Monsters. You are surrounded with whole a lot of snow, aliens, and Monsters. Hope to see you alive on the other side.
